recipe.title: Mason Jar Lemon Tahini Sauce Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; fresh basil, finely chopped ; (10 g)
¼ cup ; fresh cilantro, finely chopped ; (10 g)
¼ cup ; fresh parsley, finely chopped ; (10 g)

steps.step: In a large mason jar, combine the tahini, basil, cilantro, parsley, cumin, black pepper, salt, lemon juice, honey, olive oil, and water. Shake to combine.
Store in the fridge for up to a week.
Add to a hot pan with food, or serve over salad as you wish!

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large mason jar, combine the tahini, basil, cilantro, parsley, cumin, black pepper, salt, lemon juice, honey, olive oil, and water.
Store in the fridge for up to a week
Add to a hot pan with food, or serve over salad as you wish!
